### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace Array at position(0,0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 12
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT, Fuel: 6, Source: {'copper-ore': 5}
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 20

### Wooden Chest at position(5.5,0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, 0.5) - Inventory: {'iron-plate': 160}

### Lab at position(6.5,0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (6.5, 0.5) - Status: NO_POWER, Research: automation

### Electricity Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric poles at positions (6.5, 0.5), (13.5, 10.5), (14.5, 9.5), (13.5, 12.5), (10.5, 13.5), (12.5, 13.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have enough ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. Check the required materials and their quantities.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors related to power supply
- Verify that all power-consuming entities, like labs, are connected to a power source. Check the status of your electricity network to ensure it is functional.
